title: Spotify Wrapped ghosted NZ music again. Local artists and audiences deserve more
description: Policies designed to support and promote local content remain stuck in a previous era. NZ should follow the interventionist approach of other countries.
content:
Getty Images
Spotify has just released Spotify Wrapped, its annual end-of-year viral promotional exercise. For New Zealand musicians, however, there was little to get excited about.
